description: This file defines a Java class AccountResponse used as a data transfer object for REST API responses related to account information in an internet banking microservices project.

classes.name: AccountResponse
classes.description: A DTO class representing account response details including account number, balances, ID, type, and status.

methods.name: getActualBalance
methods.description: Returns the actual balance of the account.

methods.name: setActualBalance
methods.description: Sets the actual balance of the account.

methods.name: getAvailableBalance
methods.description: Returns the available balance in the account.

methods.name: setAvailableBalance
methods.description: Sets the available balance in the account.
